## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3bb5a85817118c683a15e62a0ae184f7b4e7996b4c9783e1eb7277e85a49ad0b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '7715-permissions-shared' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
